name: Create Status Hero Activities from Google Sheets rows
description: Every time a new row is added to Google Sheets, Make will automatically add a status activity to a member in Status Hero. This example uses the spreadsheet in [this link](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1UkjqjS8yLtrryl0ja3EBOyk2I4e6XvyXa7_0vQbTLAY/edit#gid=0).
